scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--dns-result-order=ipv4first EXPO_NO_TELEMETRY=1 EXPO_NO_DOCTOR=1 expo start
scripts.start:clear: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--dns-result-order=ipv4first EXPO_NO_TELEMETRY=1 EXPO_NO_DOCTOR=1 expo start --clear
scripts.android: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--dns-result-order=ipv4first EXPO_NO_TELEMETRY=1 EXPO_NO_DOCTOR=1 expo start --android
scripts.ios: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--dns-result-order=ipv4first EXPO_NO_TELEMETRY=1 EXPO_NO_DOCTOR=1 expo start --ios
scripts.web: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--dns-result-order=ipv4first EXPO_NO_TELEMETRY=1 EXPO_NO_DOCTOR=1 expo start --web --localhost
scripts.web:clear: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--dns-result-order=ipv4first EXPO_NO_TELEMETRY=1 EXPO_NO_DOCTOR=1 expo start --web --localhost --clear
